name: U.F.OH NO
description:
Please play in Fullscreen on a 1920x1080 monitor.

Escape the aliens and save your friends!

Basic Controls:

WASD - Movement

R - Reload

Left Click - Shoot/Melee

Message from the Dev:

Hello,

Thank you for playing my first game, I hope you enjoy.

This was a lot of fun to make, all art assets are of course from Kenney's pack, I combined sprites and for the most part only used the included colors.  The rules were a bit ambiguous with some details of what changes you can make to the art so I just did what I felt was right and within the intended rule set in those cases.

More levels coming soon for sure, I ran out of time after implementing so many mechanics.

Special thanks to T and V.
